source.3b3ff8cf:
import pandas as pd
from sklearn import preprocessing
source.513550d5:
df = pd.read_csv("../input/gender-detection/Gender_Detection.csv", sep = r',', skipinitialspace = True, encoding = 'unicode_escape')

df.head()
source.d73eecbf:
# Replacing values
df = df.replace("M", 1)
df = df.replace("F", 0)

# Typecasting
df["Name"] = df["Name"].astype(str)

# Initializing Encoder
number = preprocessing.LabelEncoder()

# Encoding
df["Name"] = number.fit_transform(df["Name"])

df.head()
source.5ff9dc38:
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split

# Columns used as predictors
X = df.drop(["Gender"], axis = 1).values

y = df["Gender"].values

X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(X, y, random_state = 0, test_size = 0.25)
source.01a0d53c:
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier

model = RandomForestClassifier(criterion = "entropy")
model.fit(X_train, y_train)

model.score(X_test, y_test)
source.d0d87c0c: # Name-based Gender Prediction with Random Forest
